\tApplication Slovotyk is designed for learning foreign languages ​​(as long as it is destined by the English).
\tIt uses a technique which I saw in the video of the training club Advance.
\tYou open the text in a foreign language and read it, marking unfamiliar words (holding your finger horizontally across the screen). The program translates the words. The list of this words, together with the translation, you can view in the screen List. After remembering the words, you read the text second time.
\tCurrent fragment you can mark with bookmarks.
\tApplication has a built-in dictionary. You can also load another dictionaries in format xdxf.

\tThe text can be loaded from the files previously copied to your phone or from the Internet. You can open files in txt, html, xml (eg file saved by this app).
\tTo download from the web application offers a list of pages.
